about_the_game:
💀 "Urban Exploration × Paranormal Streaming" – A Streamer Horror Experience! 📷

HAUNTED STREAMER is a single-player horror game where you take on the role of a streamer exploring an abandoned ruin, live-streaming paranormal phenomena.

Your goal is to attract viewers, earn donations, and escape from the cursed ruins alive.

Capture Value

Various paranormal events occur during your stream.
If you capture compelling footage that resonates with viewers, you'll receive "Likes."
The closer and longer you capture high-like footage, the more viewers you can attract.

Sanity

The longer you witness supernatural events, the more your Sanity decreases.
If it reaches zero, death awaits…

Can you strike a balance between fear and viewer expectations?

Risk & Reward

How much capture value can you maximize before your sanity runs out?
Push your limits and embrace the thrill of extreme streaming!

Super Coin Challenge

Viewers will send requests—fulfilling them earns you big donations!
But… are you sure you want to do what they’re asking?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB) / AMD Radeon RX 580 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: You are a streamer who does ghost hunting in abandoned places, and you broadcast about paranormal phenomena and urban legends from around the country. Take as many high-quality ghost videos as you can, and increase the number of subscribers to grow your channel!
